member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Applications.IApplication.SetImplicitWaitTimeout(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Sets implicit wait timeout to browser. Method was extracted with purpose not to pass it to Driver if it is similar to previous value. Simpliest implementation is: Driver.Manage().Timeouts().ImplicitlyWait = timeout

member.name: T:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Applications.Startup
member.summary: Allows to resolve dependencies for all services in the Aquality.Selenium.Core library

member.summary: Used to configure dependencies for services of the current library
member.param: function that provides an instance of
File with settings for configuration of dependencies. Pass the result of if you need to get settings from the embedded resource of your project.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Applications.Startup.GetSettings
member.summary: Provides a with settings. Value is set in Otherwise, will use default JSON settings file with name: "settings.{profile}.json". Default settings will look for the resource file (copied to binaries/Resources/ folder); If not found, will look for embedded resource in the calling assembly of this method

member.name: T:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Elements.Interfaces.IElementStateProvider
member.summary: Provides ability to define element's state (whether it is displayed, exist or not). Also provides respective positive and negative waiting methods.

member.name: P:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Elements.Interfaces.IElementStateProvider.IsDisplayed
member.summary: Gets element's displayed state: true if displayed and false otherwise.

member.name: P:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Elements.Interfaces.IElementStateProvider.IsExist
member.summary: Gets element's exist state: true if element exists in DOM (without visibility check) and false otherwise.

member.name: P:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Elements.Interfaces.IElementStateProvider.IsClickable
member.summary: Gets element's clickable state, which means element is displayed and enabled: true if element is clickable, false otherwise.

member.name: P:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Elements.Interfaces.IElementStateProvider.IsEnabled
member.summary: Gets element's Enabled state, which means element is Enabled and does not have "disabled" class: true if enabled, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Elements.Interfaces.IElementStateProvider.WaitForDisplayed(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Waits for element is displayed on the page.
member.returns: true if element displayed after waiting, false otherwise

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Elements.Interfaces.IElementStateProvider.WaitForNotDisplayed(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Waits for element is not displayed on the page.
member.returns: true if element does not display after waiting, false otherwise

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Elements.Interfaces.IElementStateProvider.WaitForExist(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Waits for element exists in DOM (without visibility check).
member.returns: true if element exist after waiting, false otherwise

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Elements.Interfaces.IElementStateProvider.WaitForNotExist(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Waits for element does not exist in DOM (without visibility check).
member.returns: true if element does not exist after waiting, false otherwise

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Elements.Interfaces.IElementStateProvider.WaitForEnabled(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Waits for element is enabled state which means element is Enabled and does not have "disabled" class.
member.exception: Throws when timeout exceeded and element not found.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Elements.Interfaces.IElementStateProvider.WaitForNotEnabled(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Waits for element is not enabled state which means element is not Enabled or does have "disabled" class.
member.returns: True if not enabled, false otherwise.
member.exception: Throws when timeout exceeded and element not found.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Elements.Interfaces.IElementStateProvider.WaitForClickable(System.Nullable{System.TimeSpan})
member.summary: Waits for element to become clickable which means element is displayed and enabled.
member.exception: Throws when timeout exceeded and element is not clickable.

member.name: T:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Utilities.JsonSettingsFile
member.summary: Provides methods to get info from JSON files. Note that the value can be overriden via Environment variable with the same name (e.g. for json path ".timeouts.timeoutScript" you can set environment variable "timeouts.timeoutScript"

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Utilities.JsonSettingsFile.#ctor(System.IO.FileInfo)
member.summary: Inistantiates class using desired JSON fileinfo.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Utilities.JsonSettingsFile.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Inistantiates class using desired resource file info.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Utilities.JsonSettingsFile.#ctor(System.String,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Inistantiates class using desired embeded resource.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Utilities.JsonSettingsFile.GetValue``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets value from JSON. Note that the value can be overriden via Environment variable with the same name (e.g. for json path ".timeouts.timeoutScript" you can set environment variable "timeouts.timeoutScript")
member.exception: Throws when there is no value found by jsonPath in desired JSON file.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Utilities.JsonSettingsFile.GetValueList``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets list of values from JSON. Note that the value can be overriden via Environment variable with the same name; values must be separated by ',' (e.g. for json path ".driverSettings.chrome.startArguments" you can set environment variable "driverSettings.chrome.startArguments")
member.exception: Throws when there are no values found by jsonPath in desired JSON file.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Utilities.JsonSettingsFile.GetValueDictionary``1(System.String)
member.exception: Throws when there are no values found by jsonPath in desired JSON file.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Utilities.JsonSettingsFile.IsValuePresent(System.String)
member.summary: Checks whether value present on JSON/Environment by JsonPath or not.
member.returns: True if present and false otherwise.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Utilities.SettingsFileExtensions.GetValueOrNew``1(Aquality.Selenium.Core.Configurations.ISettingsFile,System.String)
member.summary: Gets value from environment\setting file or return default of new T() if path doesn't exist in file and environment variables. Exception will not be threw.
member.param: Path to a value. Depends on file format, it can be xpath, path etc.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Utilities.SettingsFileExtensions.GetValueListOrEmpty``1(Aquality.Selenium.Core.Configurations.ISettingsFile,System.String)
member.summary: Gets list of values from environment\setting file or empty List if path doesn't exist in file and environment variables. Exception will not be threw.
member.param: Path to a value. Depends on file format, it can be xpath, path etc.
member.returns: List of values or empty List.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Utilities.SettingsFileExtensions.GetValueDictionaryOrEmpty``1(Aquality.Selenium.Core.Configurations.ISettingsFile,System.String)
member.summary: Gets dictionary of values from environment\setting file or empty Dictionary if path doesn't exist in file and environment variables. Exception will not be thrown. Note that each value of dictionary that is present in settings file can be overriden via Environment variable with the same name; (e.g. for capability "safebrowsing.enabled" at dictionary path ".driverSettings.chrome.options" you can set environment variable "driverSettings.chrome.options.safebrowsing.enabled")
member.param: Path to a value. Depends on file format, it can be xpath, path etc.
member.returns: Dictionary of values or empty Dictionary.

member.name: M:Aquality.Selenium.Core.Utilities.SettingsFileExtensions.GetValueOrDefault``1(Aquality.Selenium.Core.Configurations.ISettingsFile,System.String,``0)
member.summary: Gets value from environment\setting file or return default of T if path doesn't exist in file and environment variables. Exception will not be threw.
member.param: Path to a value. Depends on file format, it can be xpath, path etc.
Default value. default(T) if not specified.

member.typeparam: Type of object which is waiting for
member.param: Condition check interval. Default value is
Part of error message in case of Timeout exception
Possible exceptions that have to be ignored. Handles by default.

member.exception: Throws when timeout exceeded and condition not satisfied.
